title: 1.12.2服务器63格以上不能放水，res也改了没反应
author: 夜.无痕

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-6-30 19:13 编辑 

 res\config.yml找到这个
   Flow:
      # Level from which one to start lava and water flow blocking
      # This dont have effect in residence area
      Level: 90
      # With this set to true, lava flow outside residence is blocked
      NoLavaFlow: false
      # With this set to true, water flow outside residence is blocked
      NoWaterFlow: false
      Worlds:
      - world


改成这样试试呢

还有更新一下你的领地插件：
链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1HmMgL4-g5Cjvr4us_nJ-lw 
提取码：4ba8
